plot: "J. Pierpont Morgan's palatial yacht, flagship of the New York Yacht Club, running under full headway up the lower New York Bay, after one of the International Yacht Races. A splendid picture photographically."
title: The 'Corsair'
plot_es: "J. Pierpont Morgan's palatial yacht, flagship of the New York Yacht Club, running under full headway up the lower New York Bay, after one of the International Yacht Races. A splendid picture photographically."
